manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Tampax Radiant Tampons Skinny jeans. Pencil skirts. Leather leggings. When it comes to your style, there's no room for leaks! Luckily, Tampax Radiant tampons let you wear what you want because they're up to 100% leak-free. Tampax Radiant tampons have a LeakGuard Braid that helps stop leaks before they happen—for up to 8 hours of protection. Tampax Radiant tampons also have fierce, fun-patterned, resealable wrappers that are designed to be almost as stylish as you are. Plus they are our quietest wrapper. So grab that little black dress and stay confident all day long in Tampax Radiant tampons. 100% leak-free periods are possible with Tampax Radiant tampons LeakGuard Braid helps stop leaks before they happen This mighty tampon has your back—up to 8 hours of worry-free protection

100% Leak-Free Periods Are Possible Wear what you want. 100% leak-free periods are possible with Tampax Radiant Tampons. Our Quietest Wrapper Never be embarassed by a noisy wrapper again. Tampax Radiant has a quiet wrapper so your period stays under wraps. LeakGuard Braid Never worry about a leak getting in your way. The LeakGuard Braid helps stop leaks before they happen. FormFit Protection FormFit protection gently expands to your unique shape so it's always comfortable and closes the gaps that can cause leaks.
More ways to get up to 100% leak-free periods Tampax Radiant tampons aren't the only way to make leak-free periods possible! Also try Always Radiant pads and Always Radiant pantiliners.

FAQs How does Tampax Radiant help stop leaks? The Tampax Radiant tampon has FormFit protection. It’s designed to expand widthwise to fit your unique form and has a LeakGuard Braid to help stop leaks before they happen. How does Tampax Radiant feel different from our cardboard tampons? This tampon has a CleanGrip applicator with a rounded tip designed for incredible comfort. Plus, it has a CleanSeal resealable wrapper for worry-free disposal. If I like Tampax Radiant, what other products would be right for me? Try Always Radiant pads for protection that is amazingly absorbent, soft, and flexible with a light, fresh scent. And for daily freshness, check out Always Radiant pantiliners. What makes Tampax Radiant different from Tampax Pearl? Only Tampax Radiant features our quietest, resealable wrapper to make changing your tampon quiet, easy, and discreet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I've found my holy grail tampons
reviews.reviewText: I am late to the world of tampons. I'd been using pads for the majority of my life and decided to make the switch because frankly, I was tired of feeling gross. The worst part of my period wasn't necessarily the cramps and bloating although that isn't fun, but I find that manageable what with pain meds and the bloating eventually goes away. I just hated the feel of a soiled sanitary pad and feeling it be moistened throughout the day, especially after waking up in the morning or getting up after sitting for a while - you get that huge rush. UGH! Hate to be graphic but... yeah!Anyway, I've been trying to find my holy grail of tampons ever since. I started off with playtex but found those just to be alright so I made the switch to tampax and have like them better, however lately I have been having trouble with the push up of the tampax pearl. For some reason (maybe a bad box) but it has become very difficult to get them to deploy with the push up. I'd been hearing so much how wonderful Tampax radiant tampons are and they have lived up to their reputation. I've purchased the regulars offline but was having so much trouble finding the super plus tampons anywhere. As with all things when I can't find it offline I come to amazon and voila! What was even better is that there was a coupon so these turned out to be super cheap add on item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2015
reviews.reviewText: Oh, I would love to write a scathing review of these "high class" tampons. I want to make fun of the fancy design on the applicator, and the crazy easy-to-open packaging. But guess what? I love them. They were very easy to grip and insert, and they stayed in place better than any other brand I have tried. No leaks either. Guess I'm just a fancy tampon girl in the end. Seriously, try these- I doubt you will be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2015
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely genius! This tampon is great for traveling too. Very discreet and small enough to fit in my pocket. Needless to say the design package is cool as heck but the wrapper makes things so much easier to disassemble in a hurry if need be. I recommend this product to anyone that needs that extra comfort and reassurance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Super Plus NOT for Day 1 Heavy Flow
reviews.reviewText: Who knew that not all tampons are the same? I used to think that the applicators were the only thing that set tampons apart and that the insides were basically the same. But now I've leaked horribly after an hour using these super plus tampons twice now and each time the tampon has still had a large unused white streak left behind. What's a half a super plus tampon worth? Not much! And unfortunately I had stocked up on a sale. I'm sooooooooo disappointed and fearful to leave the house... Grrr. Incidentally, I've never had any issue with any other Tampax or generic version copying Tampax in 25 years. I recognize that we're all put together uniquely; so if you're going to try them, I definitely recommend trying a small box first!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like the packaging that they come in
reviews.reviewText: I usually Tampax pearl, but these are a decent substitute. I like the packaging that they come in, so that you can slip the applicator back before putting it in the trash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cadillac of tampons
reviews.reviewText: Tampax Radiant brand are the Cadillac of tampons! Each one is in a nice little non-crinkly pouch which provides for discreet use and disposal. So far I've had no leak issues at all with these. The string could be a little nicer, but not a big deal. I'd recommend and will buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars it is a bad experience.
reviews.reviewText: it is broken when it comes to me.and the box is not ok . the image is fuzzy.it is a bad experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2014
reviews.reviewText: Love these tampons, I got a great deal on them with the coupon. Couldn't beat the price for something I already use.

It's strange doing a tampon review, but I wanted to say that super plus is great! Hard to find in stores, glad to have been able to try it through amazon. Will be buying again!The added price (compared to tampax pearl) is worth the level of protection you get! The packaging is nice for public bathrooms, very quiet and great for disposal.
A must have for my super heavy soaker days. I have very heavy periods and could not survive without these. I wish they made an even more absorbent tampon so I could wear it longer!
They’re tampons. Not much more to say.
They work what else can I say 🤷🏼‍♀️
